com.barchart.udt.nio

Class SelectorUDT

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.nio.channels.Selector
      • java.nio.channels.spi.AbstractSelector
        • com.barchart.udt.nio.SelectorUDT
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    public class SelectorUDT
extends AbstractSelector
    you must use SelectorProviderUDT.openSelector() to obtain instance of this class; do not use JDK Selector.open()

      • wakeup

        public Selector wakeup()
        Wakeup the selector. NOTE: it is recommended to user timed select(long) (say, timeout = 100 milliseconds) to avoid missed wakeup() calls which are rare but possible in current implementation (accepted in favor of design simplicity / performance)
        Specified by:
        wakeup in class Selector
